seo.title: Seedream 4.5 - ByteDance AI Image Generator | 2K HD
seo.description: Create 2K HD images with Seedream 4.5. ByteDance's AI supports text-to-image and image-to-image generation. 30 credits per image.

hero.subtitle: Experience ByteDance's Seedream 4.5 - a powerful AI image generator with 2K resolution, precise image editing, and exceptional detail. Generate professional-grade images quickly to meet your creative needs.

what.title: What is Seedream 4.5 AI Image Generator?
what.description: Seedream 4.5, developed by ByteDance, is an advanced AI image generator that combines powerful text-to-image and image-to-image capabilities. This professional AI image generation platform delivers 2K high-resolution images with high speed and quality, perfect for designers, marketers, and content creators who demand professional-quality AI-generated images.

core1.title: 2K High-Resolution AI Image Generation
core1.description: Seedream 4.5 rapidly generates 2K (2048x2048) high-definition images. This AI image generator delivers exceptional detail, color accuracy, and image quality that meets professional standards for digital marketing, social media, and commercial projects.

core2.title: Powerful Image-to-Image Editing
core2.description: Unlike traditional AI image generators, Seedream 4.5 achieves breakthrough capabilities in image-to-image editing. Upload existing images and make precise edits through text descriptions - perfect for image optimization, style transfer, and creative transformation.

core3.title: Flexible Dual-Mode Generation
core3.description: Supports both text-to-image and image-to-image modes, providing comprehensive creative freedom. Create new images from scratch or transform existing ones to meet various creative scenarios.

why.title: Why Choose Seedream 4.5 AI Image Generator
why.subtitle: Seedream 4.5, powered by ByteDance's advanced technology, outperforms traditional image creation methods and competing AI image generators with high-speed generation, 2K resolution output, and powerful image editing capabilities.

how.title: How to Use Seedream 4.5 AI Image Generator
how.subtitle: From concept to professional 2K AI-generated image in simple steps. Seedream 4.5 makes advanced AI image generation intuitive and accessible.

step1.title: Choose Generation Mode
step1.description: Select text-to-image or image-to-image mode based on your needs. Text-to-image mode creates from scratch, while image-to-image mode edits and transforms existing images. Both modes provide powerful AI capabilities.

step2.title: Enter Creative Description
step2.description: Enter a detailed text description of the image you want to create or modify. Seedream 4.5's AI understands complex prompts. Include specific details about style, composition, lighting, colors, and mood for optimal AI image generation results.

step3.title: AI Generates HD Images
step3.description: Seedream 4.5's AI model rapidly processes your requirements and generates high-fidelity 2K images. The AI understands your intent and creates professional-grade images that meet your expectations, ensuring superior output quality.

step4.title: Preview, Download & Optimize
step4.description: Preview your AI-generated image instantly. Satisfied with the result? Download immediately for use. Need adjustments? Modify your prompt or switch modes and regenerate - iterate as many times as needed with Seedream 4.5's rapid generation capabilities.

faq.title: Seedream 4.5 Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about Seedream 4.5 AI image generator

items.question: What is Seedream 4.5 and how does it differ from other AI image generators?
items.answer: Seedream 4.5 is an advanced AI image generator developed by ByteDance, offering dual modes of text-to-image and image-to-image. Unlike other AI image generators, Seedream 4.5 provides 2K HD output, powerful image editing capabilities, and fast generation speeds. It excels in image quality, editing flexibility, and cost-effectiveness.

items.question: How fast is Seedream 4.5's AI image generation?
items.answer: Seedream 4.5 can rapidly generate 2K (2048x2048) high-resolution images. Whether in text-to-image or image-to-image mode, generation completes in a short time, significantly improving creative efficiency. This high-speed generation capability makes Seedream 4.5 ideal for rapid prototyping and high-volume content creation.

items.question: What image resolution does Seedream 4.5 support?
items.answer: Seedream 4.5 supports 2K HD (2048x2048 pixels) output. Images feature excellent detail, accurate color reproduction, and professional-grade quality suitable for digital media, social platforms, and commercial projects. This resolution achieves a perfect balance between quality and file size.

items.question: How do I use Seedream 4.5's image-to-image feature?
items.answer: Using Seedream 4.5's image-to-image feature is simple! Just upload an existing image, then enter a text description explaining the modifications you want. The AI will understand your intent, maintaining the original image's pose and structure while making precise edits according to your description. This is perfect for image optimization, style transfer, and creative transformation.

items.question: What is the cost of generating images with Seedream 4.5?
items.answer: Seedream 4.5 consumes 30 credits per generation, whether in text-to-image or image-to-image mode. This provides a cost-effective professional AI image generation solution, allowing you to create extensively without worrying about high costs.

items.question: Is Seedream 4.5 suitable for commercial use?
items.answer: Absolutely! Seedream 4.5 is designed for professional and commercial applications. With 2K HD resolution, powerful editing controls, dual-mode generation capabilities, and data security guarantees, Seedream 4.5 meets the needs of businesses, agencies, and creators requiring professional AI image generation.
